description:
Discover How to Save Yourself a Fortune by Writing Your Own Sales Copy That Gets Results

This course has been designed to take business owners through all the steps needed to create:-

  • Sales copy that grabs your prospects and compels them to buy…
  • Sales copy that converts casual visitors into raving fans…
  • Sales copy that will have your phone ringing off the hook!

Whether you want your copy to bring in leads, build your list, or make sales directly from the page, it’s covered in this course.

“How to Write Sizzling Sales Copy” is delivered as 22 bite-sized chunks of solid gold information. I don’t do fluff and flannel! I get straight into the nuts and bolts of exactly what steps you need to take to write copy that converts over and over again.

What We’ll Be Covering

Over the course of these 24 Modules you’ll discover:

  • The 12-step structure of a sales letter – get this right and your copy will almost write itself
  • Seven different ways of writing headlines that connect emotionally and lead the reader on into the copy so you get your copy read
  • What you need to have on a Squeeze page for maximum sign ups
  • What to do before you ever start writing any piece of copy – get the foundations right and your copy could stand for years
  • What NEVER to do if you don’t want your visitors hitting the Back button.

And I’ll show you how to…

  • Get over the dreaded Writer’s Block – if you do this you’ll never suffer from blank page syndrome again
  • Write powerful, intriguing headlines that will draw your readers into the rest of your copy – without a good headline your copy won’t be read
  • Craft bullets that touch your reader’s emotions and have them salivating for what you’re offering
  • Use testimonials to get under the radar so your reader doesn’t feel sold to
  • State your guarantee to set your prospect’s mind at ease and increase conversions many times over
  • Write autoresponder emails to build a strong relationship with your list to convert them into raving fans
  • And much, much more…

And that’s not all…

In addition to the video lessons you also get…

  • Full transcriptions of every video – you can print them out and make your own notes as you watch
  • PDF files of the MindMaps I use – you can print them out and make MindMap notes if that’s what you prefer
  • A list of the Top 100 Power Words to spice up your copy so it connects more deeply with your reader’s emotions

Invest in your future and the future of your business by signing up to study "How to Write Sizzling Sales Copy" right now!
title: How to Write Sizzling Sales Copy
